short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discord integration that allows effortless download of complete chat histories from private and group chats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discord Chat Exporter is a straightforward Chrome extension for exporting chat histories from Discord. It enables users to easily download conversations from both private and group chats into TSV format. This tool is useful for those who need to archive or review their Discord chats. Simple and efficient, it is designed for users seeking a practical solution for chat export on Discord.
